# Steam Breath (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]], [[3rd Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 3]] (water)

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M (a glowing piece of charcoal doused with water)

**Range:** 30 ft.

**Area:** Cone

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Complete Arcane (WotC)Â­, pg. 124

You expel a powerful breath of superheated steam that extends outward as a cone of scalding mist. Creatures within the cone take 1d6 points of fire damage per caster level (maximum 10d6). The steam clouds dissipate instantly after the damage is dealt.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 3, Wizard 3 to Level.
